Detailed Description

Procedures used to manage sessions.

Definition in file llp_sessions.h.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum char * llp_states

Enumeration of the possible states that a session can be in.

Enumerator:
LLP_STATE_CLOSED  Session is closed.
LLP_STATE_CONNECTING  Session is trying to connect.
LLP_STATE_BEING_CONNECTED  Some host is trying to connect.
LLP_STATE_ESTABLISHED  The connection is alive.
LLP_STATE_CLOSE_WAIT  Trying to close this session.
LLP_STATE_TIME_WAIT  Waiting for new close requests.

Definition at line 48 of file llp_sessions.h.

Variable Documentation

llp_session_t llp_sessions[LLP_MAX_SESSIONS]

Array that stores the session information for each session present on the link layer. Access to this structure must be governed my mutexes.

Definition at line 69 of file llp_sessions.c.
